member.name: M:Elect.Logger.Utils.CreditCardHelper.Filter(System.String)
member.summary: Filters credit card numbers from the input.
member.returns:
The
with credit card numbers removed.

member.name: M:Elect.Logger.Utils.CreditCardHelper.IsValidCreditCardNumber(System.String)
member.summary: Validates a credit card number using Luhn algorithm. Extremely fast Luhn algorithm implementation, based on pseudo code from Cliff L. Biffle (http://microcoder.livejournal.com/17175.html) Copyleft Thomas @ Orb of Knowledge: http://orb-of-knowledge.blogspot.com/2009/08/extremely-fast-luhn-function-for-c.html
member.returns: True if a valid credit card number; otherwise false.
